It is needed. I could re-write it as this which does the same thing and may be easier to understand.
String remoteGroupID = (cutTopic.substring(index+1, index+2));
index++ This means use the variable and then increment it AFTER the value is used.
++index This means increment the variable BEFORE it is used.
